description: Sergeant Saitou Hajime is the commander of a contingent of "Space Cavaliers" (Space Marines) stationed on Planet 11. After a fierce Comet Empire attack he and his men are rescued by the Yamato. Uncouth and belligerent, they refuse to respect the crew of their new home and frequently get into fights, frustrated at their reduced role as "passengers". However, during the adventures of Yamato, Saitou and his men prove their worth in ground combat.
name: Saitou Hajime
